reviewText: Experience is a platform/puzzle game with some nice music. The menu is in Russian with the option to change to English, after figuring out which one is the option for language. Once you change the language and go back to the main screen...well damn, its back in Russian again! I don't read Russian and the games description reads  the main character aimlessly wanders through various locations destroying everything"
date: well thats about all you can do if you can't read the text and theres no story! There is no sense of direction
hoursPlayed: no map and no idea what
voteText: where or why I even started playing this so-called game. To make a good platforming game one of the most important elements is the controls. The controls are floaty and terrible and the weapons are pathetic and inaccurate.  Each level is muddled and has annoying fake difficulty because of the crappy controls. You're physically unable to collect all of the loot that you recieve when killing enemies. The asinine game design requires you to die multiple times just to figure out some of the puzzles. Its not at all fun and should be avoided! Experience is a horrible Experience...FYI this was in a  bundle and I did not upvote it while it was in Greenlight!"

reviewText: Unless you can read Russian (I'm assuming that's what the language is) This game is a piece of trash. You can't even change the language setting and have it save. Everytime I switched it and left the menu it switched it back. I have no idea what the win condition of each level is, you physically cannot collect all of the money that you earn from killing enemies, and the game design requires you to die multiple times just to figure out some of the puzzles. Terrible game and I would not recommend this game.\nSave your $2 and buy an ice cream or something.

reviewText:
https://youtu.be/EGLSXuX8iSA

Despite changing the language to English in the option it doesn't stick so much of this game is a mystery due to the language barrier.

One of the most important elements to making a good platformer game is the controls.  Take the loose soupy controls of the character and combine that with painfully inaccurate weapons cause 'Experience' to be a bad one.

reviewText:
Product received for free

A Platforming Action Shooterhttps://youtu.be/UROgjBia3Sg
+ Good soundtrack
+ Lots of weapons to unlock and upgrade

- The game is in the Russian language, the options menu let's you change to English but does not save your selection
- No sense of direction, no objectives, no map... I honestly had no idea what or where I was supposed to be going.
- No story or dialogue, the game description says the main character aimlessly wanders...destroying everything"
- Honestly seems unfinished or rushed to release"

reviewText:
Unts unts unts...
Doof dah, doof dah.
This is a side scrolling platformer.
The shooting feels nice and there is definitely a sense of things being destroyed.
No story, or reason to continue. Just...Kill 25 things in this level, upgrade your guns.
Would like to see a little something extra to actually make this game GOOD.
As it is, it is worth a few hours of your time maybe.
